name: Barbequed Cabbage
author: ericasalad
summary: This is a delicious way to use up cabbage, and a great way to make someone a cabbage lover!
ingredients: ½ head cabbage, cut into thick shreds
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat
Evenly divide the cabbage among 4 squares of aluminum foil
Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of soy sauce over each pile of cabbage, and place a tablespoon of butter on top
Season with pepper to taste, and fold the sides of the foil over the cabbage, sealing to form a packet
Place packets onto preheated grill, and cook until the cabbage is tender, 15 to 20 minutes
